allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Visualizations page and export functionality to Dashboard

This commit adds comprehensive visualization and export capabilities:

New Features:
- Created Visualizations page with AI-powered chart generation
- Added visualization template library \(bar, line, pie, donut, area, table charts\)
- Implemented step-by-step visualization builder with 5-step wizard
- Added export functionality to Dashboard \(PDF, CSV, JSON formats\)
- Integrated AI prompt-based visualization generation

Dashboard Updates:
- Added export dropdown menu with PDF/CSV/JSON options
- Implemented export handler with proper file download
- Added visual icons for different export formats
- Integrated AnimatePresence for smooth dropdown animations

Sidebar Updates:
- Added "Visualizations" navigation item with BarChart3 icon
- Updated navigation structure to include new route

UI/UX Enhancements:
- Template preview cards with hover effects
- Saved visualizations management
- Category filtering system
- AI-powered natural language visualization creation
- Multi-step wizard with progress indicators
- Responsive grid layouts for template library

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
